${ModID}:TodoItem.NAME: Todo Item
${ModID}:TodoItem.FLAVOR: TODO: make this a sweet relic.

${ModID}:AchillesHeel.NAME: Achilles' Heel
${ModID}:AchillesHeel.FLAVOR: The secret behind Achilles' great feets!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yWeak, apply an additional #b1 #yWeak.

${ModID}:BrassKnuckles.NAME: Brass Knuckles
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yVulnerable, apply an additional #b1 #yVulnerable.

${ModID}:Duality2.NAME: Duality 2
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ySkill, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.

${ModID}:Propeller.NAME: Propeller
${ModID}:Propeller.FLAVOR: Don't stick your hand inside it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 4th turn, gain #b22 #yBlock.

${ModID}:WoodenShield.NAME: Wooden Shield
${ModID}:WoodenShield.FLAVOR: Blocks for less than you wood want.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #yBlock equal to current turn number.
